Name: market for heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 200kW electrical | heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 200kW electrical | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8109/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 200kW electrical', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the production of a heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, with an electrical output of 200kW. The infrastructure is dimensioned to be connected to a biomass burning boiler with capacity 1,000kWth, producing about 200 kWel.  It has a lifetime of 20 years and a lifetime capacity of 35,040,000 kWh. The process includes the most important materials used for the construction of the unit, their decommission and energy required for the construction.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
